title: Need help!!! Clubs not working and not working in the lol friends app as well.
body: Today me and my  friends have been having issues with our club chat. It keeps saying "We ran into an error loading your clubs; try re-logging to reload." On the lol friends app our clubs completely gone & not only that but in games my club tag is not next to my name anymore in games.

replies.body: Clubs are currently down due to an issue.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on this!  Hang tight until it's all fixed up.
The Same Has happened to me, so its not just u brutha ;D. Friends still load so that's sweet
